00047 /* Private types -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00048 typedef union
00049 {
00050   struct
00051   {
00052     unsigned long Key1     :1;
00053     unsigned long Key2     :1;
00054     unsigned long Key3     :1;
00055     unsigned long Key4     :1;
00056     unsigned long Key5     :1;
00057     unsigned long Key6     :1;
00058     unsigned long Key7     :1;
00059     unsigned long Key8     :1;
00060     unsigned long Key9     :1;
00061     unsigned long Key10    :1;
00062     unsigned long Key11    :1;
00063     unsigned long Key12    :1;
00064     unsigned long Key13    :1;
00065     unsigned long Key14    :1;
00066     unsigned long Key15    :1;
00067     unsigned long Key16    :1;
00068   } Bit;
00069   u16 Data;
00070 } TouchKey_TypeDef;
00071 
00072 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00073 #define I2C_TOUCHKEY_SPEED         (50000)          /*!< I2C speed                                          */
00074 #define I2C_TOUCHKEY_DEV_ADDR      (0x50)           /*!< I2C device address                                 */
00075 #define KEYSTATUS_CMD              (0x08)
00076 
00077 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00078 void I2C_Configuration(void);
00079 u32 Touchkey_ButtonRead(void);
00080 void _I2C_Touchkey_AckPolling(void);
00081 
00082 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00083 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00084   * @brief  Main program.
00085   * @retval None
00086   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00087 int main(void)
00088 {
00089   u32 uCounter;
00090   TouchKey_TypeDef Touch;
00091 
00092   RETARGET_Configuration();           /* Retarget Related configuration                                     */
00093 
00094   I2C_Configuration();                /* I2C configuration                                                  */
00095 
00096   printf("\r\nTouchkey test start....\r\n");
00097 
00098   while (1)
00099   {
00100     Touch.Data = Touchkey_ButtonRead();
00101     printf("\rPADS: %d %d %d %d %d %d %d %d, DATA=%04x",
00102            Touch.Bit.Key9,
00103            Touch.Bit.Key10,
00104            Touch.Bit.Key2,
00105            Touch.Bit.Key3,
00106            Touch.Bit.Key4,
00107            Touch.Bit.Key5,
00108            Touch.Bit.Key7,
00109            Touch.Bit.Key8,
00110            Touch.Data);
00111 
00112     uCounter = (HSE_VALUE >> 2);
00113     while (uCounter--);
00114   }
00115 }
00116 
00117 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00118   * @brief  Configure the I2C.
00119   * @retval None
00120   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00121 void I2C_Configuration(void)
00122 {
00123   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00124     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00125     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO       = 1;
00126     TOUCHKEY_I2C_CLK(CKCUClock) = 1;
00127     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00128   }
00129 
00130   /* Configure I2C SCL pin, I2C SDA pin                                                                     */
00131   AFIO_GPxConfig(TOUCHKEY_I2C_SCL_GPIO_ID, TOUCHKEY_I2C_SCL_AFIO_PIN, TOUCHKEY_I2C_SCL_AFIO_MODE);
00132   AFIO_GPxConfig(TOUCHKEY_I2C_SDA_GPIO_ID, TOUCHKEY_I2C_SDA_AFIO_PIN, TOUCHKEY_I2C_SDA_AFIO_MODE);
00133 
00134   { /* I2C configuration                                                                                    */
00135 
00136     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00137        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00138        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00139     */
00140     I2C_InitTypeDef I2C_InitStructure;
00141 
00142     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_GeneralCall = I2C_GENERALCALL_DISABLE;
00143     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_AddressingMode = I2C_ADDRESSING_7BIT;
00144     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_Acknowledge = I2C_ACK_DISABLE;
00145     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_OwnAddress = 0x00;
00146     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_Speed = I2C_TOUCHKEY_SPEED;
00147     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_SpeedOffset = 0;
00148     I2C_Init(TOUCHKEY_I2C, &I2C_InitStructure);
00149   }
00150 
00151   /* Enable I2C                                                                                             */
00152   I2C_Cmd(TOUCHKEY_I2C, ENABLE);
00153 }
00154 
00155 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00156   * @brief  pending.
00157   * @retval None
00158   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00159 u32 Touchkey_ButtonRead(void)
00160 {
00161   u32 uData;
00162 
00163   /* Touchkey addressread                                                                                   */
00164   _I2C_Touchkey_AckPolling();
00165 
00166   while (!I2C_CheckStatus(TOUCHKEY_I2C, I2C_MASTER_TX_EMPTY));
00167   I2C_SendData(TOUCHKEY_I2C, KEYSTATUS_CMD);
00168 
00169   /* Touchkey addressread                                                                                   */
00170   I2C_TargetAddressConfig(TOUCHKEY_I2C, I2C_TOUCHKEY_DEV_ADDR, I2C_MASTER_READ);
00171   while (!I2C_CheckStatus(TOUCHKEY_I2C, I2C_MASTER_RECEIVER_MODE));
00172 
00173   /* enable master receiver ACK                                                                             */
00174   I2C_AckCmd(TOUCHKEY_I2C, ENABLE);
00175 
00176   /* sequential read                                                                                        */
00177   while (!I2C_CheckStatus(TOUCHKEY_I2C, I2C_MASTER_RX_NOT_EMPTY));
00178   uData = I2C_ReceiveData(TOUCHKEY_I2C);
00179   I2C_AckCmd(TOUCHKEY_I2C, DISABLE);
00180   while (!I2C_CheckStatus(TOUCHKEY_I2C, I2C_MASTER_RX_NOT_EMPTY));
00181   uData |= (I2C_ReceiveData(TOUCHKEY_I2C) << 8);
00182 
00183   /* end of read                                                                                            */
00184   I2C_GenerateSTOP(TOUCHKEY_I2C);
00185 
00186   return uData;
00187 }
00188 
00189 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00190   * @brief  EEPROM acknowledge polling.
00191   * @retval None
00192   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00193 void _I2C_Touchkey_AckPolling(void)
00194 {
00195   u32 reg;
00196   /* wait if bus busy                                                                                       */
00197   while (I2C_GetFlagStatus(TOUCHKEY_I2C, I2C_FLAG_BUSBUSY));
00198 
00199   /* send slave address until ack reply                                                                     */
00200   while (1)
00201   {
00202     /* send slave address                                                                                   */
00203     I2C_TargetAddressConfig(TOUCHKEY_I2C, I2C_TOUCHKEY_DEV_ADDR, I2C_MASTER_WRITE);
00204 
00205     while (1)
00206     {
00207       reg = TOUCHKEY_I2C->SR;
00208       if (reg & I2C_FLAG_ADRS)
00209         return;
00210       if (reg & I2C_FLAG_RXNACK)
00211       {
00212         I2C_ClearFlag(TOUCHKEY_I2C, I2C_FLAG_RXNACK);
00213         break;
00214       }
00215     }
00216   }
00217 }

00230      Debug message can be added here.
00231      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00232   */
00233

00235   {
00236   }
00237 }
